title: Junior Software Engineer
description_summary: Hiring a Junior Software Engineer to build web applications, collaborate across teams, and develop community-focused software.
description: We are seeking a motivated Junior Software Engineer to join our development team. The ideal candidate will work on building and maintaining web applications, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and contributing to innovative software solutions that serve our community.
responsibilities: Develop and maintain web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks
Collaborate with senior developers and designers to implement new features
Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code
Participate in code reviews and contribute to team best practices
Debug and fix bugs in existing applications
Work with APIs and integrate third-party services
Assist in database design and optimization
Participate in agile development processes
Stay updated with emerging technologies and industry trends
Contribute to technical documentation and knowledge sharing
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field
1-2 years of experience in software development (or equivalent projects)
Strong understanding of JavaScript and modern web technologies
Experience with version control systems (Git/GitHub)
Basic knowledge of database systems and SQL
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
